headline: More Node.js APIs in Cloudflare Workers — Streams, Path, StringDecoder
keywords: Developer Week, Developers, Node.js, Cloudflare Workers, JavaScript
description: Today we are announcing support for three additional APIs from Node.js in Cloudflare Workers — stream, crypto, and http/https.request. This increases compatibility with the existing ecosystem of open source NPM packages, allowing you to use your preferred libraries in Workers.
